name: LIVE Poker 1 on 1
description:
*** BEST online 1-1 Poker game for iPad & iPhone! ***
Do you love Texas poker? Do you want to play against the best players across the world any time, anywhere?

The only thing you need is your iPhone/iPod touch or an iPad and an internet connection!.

What if you are new to poker and don't even know the basics?
Whatever is your skill level, there’s always a table waiting for you.
Come and join the club where poker fans from all over the world gather to play
and chat about the best gambling game in the world.
It's exciting Las Vegas style poker on the go!
Join now and receive $10,000 in chips for FREE!

MORE FREE CHIPS:

► FREE Daily bonuses up to $100,000 chips.
► FREE weekend and special occasion bonus.
► FREE chips for inviting your friends.
► Get $10,000 chips FREE as New User Bonus.

COOL FEATURES:

► Live Chat
► Sit-n-Go tournament Mode
► Facebook connect for fast registration (optional)
► High Stakes Tables
► Cool personal Avatars
► Fast Tables
► Mini Slot game to pass some time and to win big bucks while waiting for your opponent.
► Personalised profile and friend lists
► Large selection of gifts, snacks, and drinks to share with others
► Easily invite friends to join your table
► Chat with friends at your poker table to bluff, taunt, celebrate, and praise.
► Search your friends and add them as buddies on the go.
► Animated Smileys
► Statistics - Enhanced statistics to keep a track of how well you are doing.
► Leader board to track the top 100 users.

Join us and be a part of the biggest poker community on iPhone/iPad.

For Support contact us at : support@phonato.com
